author: yokem55
content:
I'm seeing a string of handful of bad blocks proposed by Reth on Hoodi. I'm seeing this on slots 1623386, 1623414, 1623436, 1623530. I don't think anything else is accepting these blocks as dora reports them as missed blocks.
Lodestar logs looks as follows -

content:

author: pawandhananjay
content: We saw this on our infra too. Our reth 1.8.2 node rejected the payload as well, so doesn't seem like an issue in the latest reth release

author: yokem55
content: Looks like the reth folks were already on it. They had a problem on the block building side of things and fixed in 1.8.3
